entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Miramichi
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:53 AM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Miramichi 2:00 PM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023
Temperature: 1.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 70 %
Dewpoint: -3.0°C
Wind: NE 18 km/h gust 27 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h this afternoon. High plus 2. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Blowing snow along parts of the coast before morning. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Blowing snow along parts of the coast in the morning. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 1. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023
